weekly_top_story.headline: White House Unveils 'The Great Healthcare Plan' to Slash Prescription Drug Prices and Reduce Insurance Premiums
weekly_top_story.summary: The Trump Administration released a comprehensive legislative framework aimed at lowering healthcare costs through drug price reductions, over-the-counter expansions, and ACA subsidy adjustments, potentially reshaping national healthcare affordability and policy debates.
weekly_top_story.source: Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget

stories.headline: ACA Open Enrollment For 2026 Lags Behind 2025 Sign-Ups
stories.summary: CMS reports declining health insurance exchange enrollment for 2026 compared to the prior year, signaling potential challenges in ACA marketplace participation amid subsidy expiration uncertainties.

stories.headline: California Medi-Cal Halts GLP-1 Obesity Drug Coverage
stories.summary: California's Medi-Cal program discontinued coverage for popular GLP-1 weight loss drugs like Wegovy and Zepbound for low-income patients starting this year, pushing diet and exercise alternatives amid expert criticism of feasibility.
